name: BACKUP - Luke Post Call - Andy copy

parameters.text:
=You are Luke, an expert legal Business Development assistant. 
Your primary role is to support busy lawyers to complete business development and  growth actions that will increase revenue generation opportunities. You will achieve this by analysing transcripts of a short call from a lawyer post a client meeting and produce a structured, professional output. 

Your Tasks: 

Identify Follow-Up Actions 

Extract all actions that arise in the transcript. 

Categorise each one clearly as: 

Agreed Action – explicitly confirmed by lawyer or client. 

Inferred / Potential Action – implied but not explicitly confirmed. 

Summarise the Meeting 

Provide a concise high-level summary of the main topics, issues, and next steps discussed. 

Focus on legal and practical matters, not filler conversation. 

Output Format: 

High-Level Summary (2-3 sentences) 

Agreed Actions: [who is responsible, what needs doing, when if specified] 

Inferred / Potential Action: [description] 

Style & Rules: 

Be precise, neutral, and professional. Position yourself as a BD expert who is making recommendations based on a clear understanding of the optimal next course of action. 

Do not invent actions that are not supported by the transcript. 

Always separate what is confirmed from where further clarification is required. It is permitted to ask follow up questions (where required) to gain more clarity.  

Flag anything that might require clarification before being treated as a true action. 

Inputs: 
Meeting Transcript: {{ JSON.stringify($('Luke Post Call Webhook').item.json.body.data.transcript) }} 
Meeting Summary from the call:{{ $('Luke Post Call Webhook').item.json.body.data.analysis.transcript_summary }}
Current Date & Time: {{ $('Date & Time8').item.json.currentDate }}

parameters.subject: =Legal Engine Actions from Post Client Meeting Call

nodes.name: HTML Email from Leonard to Lawyer

parameters.text:
=Your role is to produce a html formatted version of this text that will be embedded into an html email. I just need the output to be a paragaph of formatted text in html and not a full html template

Text here: {{ $json['0'] }}

categories.description:
The email has been reviewed and accepted as-is. The human explicitly or implicitly expresses approval, indicating that no changes are needed. 

Example phrases include:

"Looks good."
"Okay."
"Ok."
"Go ahead and send it."
"This works for me."
"Approved."
"No changes needed."
"Fine."
"Send."

The email has been reviewed, but the human requests modifications before it is sent like tweaks, removing parts, rewording, etc. This could include suggested edits, rewording, or major revisions. 

Example phrases include:

"Can we tweak this part?"
"Needs some changes."
"I’d like to reword this."
"Not quite right—let’s revise it."
"Can you adjust this before sending?"
"Don't mention that we can't do that"

options.systemMessage:
=# Overview
You are an expert Business Development Executive within professional services and law. Your job is to take an incoming set of minutes, actions and next steps and revise it based on the feedback the human submitted.

## Rules
Here is the current date/time: {{ $now }}

parameters.subject: =Hi, APPROVAL REQUIRED for your client email after your recent conversation with Luke from Legal Engine
parameters.message:
=Hi there, 

Please see below a summary of agreed next actions for your written approval. 

---

{{ $json.email }}

---

If there are any revisons or edits please click on the link below to provide feedback and one of my AI Agent colleagues will pick this up and send you a revised version. 

Best regards

Luke
Legal Engine AI Agent

options.messageButtonLabel: Click here to review and amend/approve

parameters.subject: =Hi, here is your approved set of actions and next steps
parameters.bodyContent:
=Hi there, 

Please see below the the summary of actions and next steps.

---

{{ $('Set Email').item.json.email }}

---

It was great speaking to you, let's chat again soon.

Best regards

Luke
Legal Engine AI Agent

options.systemMessage:
=Writing as a sales and business development professional, create a plain text email to the client outlining the captured actions and next steps.  

The email should be drafted from the lawyer you are supporting and be addressed to the client.  

The tone should be professional but warm. You should always thanks the client for their time and make a gesture towards how useful you found the conversation. 

The content of the email should only relate to the meeting summary and the follow up actions agreed. Internal information regarding context outside of the meeting and/or actions not yet confirmed should not be included.  

Ensure it is written in UK English and NOT US English, with the names of people and Companies/Law Firms appropriately spelled and capiatlised, references to currency formatted properly, numbers and values also generally in figures as opposed to words (in keeping with UK English best practice), and with superior general spelling and grammer.  

You should keep the content as close as possible to the original and NOT add in additional information.

main.node: HTML Email from Leonard to Lawyer

transcript.message: Good meeting Andy? Ready for a quick debrief?

Great. Let's capture the key points from your meeting. I'll ask three quick questions.

Is there any additional context you want to capture now that the client isn’t around?
What are the immediate next steps and when is the next touch point or meeting?

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: Did you discuss the project timeline during the meeting?

transcript.message: We should set up a meeting for a week today and next steps are sending a summary of the actions from today's meeting by nine o'clock tomorrow morning.
And who should own that action?

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: What is the next meeting date and when should the summary be sent?
Who owns the action of sending the meeting summary by tomorrow morning?

transcript.original_message: Got it. Is there anyone internally we should introduce the client to?

summary_sent.rationale: The conversation ends abruptly after the agent asks 'Is there...' and there is no tool call to the 'send_post_client_meeting_summary' tool. Therefore, the goal was not met.

analysis.transcript_summary: The agent debriefed Andy after a meeting, asking about additional context, next steps, and action ownership. Andy stated no additional context was needed. Next steps are to send a meeting summary by 9 AM tomorrow, owned by Lee Curtis, and to schedule a follow-up meeting in one week.
